template.name: FlyFish_Genes
template.title: FlyFISH expression term + Stage [D. melanogaster] --> Genes.

query.name: FlyFish_Genes
query.longDescription: For a certain embryonic stage of D. melanogaster and a given expression term, show all the genes that are expressed according to the FlyFISH project.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

template.name: Gene_Location
template.title: Gene --> Chromosomal location.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_Location
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.locations.start Gene.locations.end Gene.locations.strand
query.longDescription: Show the chromosome and the chromosome location of a particular gene.

constraint.description: Show the chromosome and the chromosome location for gene:

template.name: Gene_BDGPFlyFish
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> FlyFish + BDGP in situ data.

query.name: Gene_BDGPFlyFish
query.longDescription: For a specified D. melanogaster gene, show all results from the FlyFISH and the BDGP in situ projects. (Data Source: BDGP, FlyFISH).

template.name: Gene_RegionOverlappingTFbindingsite
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> CRMs + TF binding sites overlapping these CRMs.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_RegionOverlappingTFbindingsite
query.longDescription: For a specific D. melanogaster gene, find cis-regulatory modules with overlapping TF Binding sites. Show their locations. (Data Source: REDfly).
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.value: REDfly Drosophila transcription factor binding sites

template.name: TranscriptionFactor_Genes
template.title: TranscriptionFactor --> Genes that have binding sites for this factor.
template.comment: this is redundant since we have Protein_TFBindingSiteChromosomeGene, no?

query.name: TranscriptionFactor_Genes
query.view: Gene.regulatoryRegions.factor.secondaryIdentifier Gene.regulatoryRegions.factor.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand
query.longDescription: For specified transcription factor(s) show the genes associated binding sites

constraint.description: Show genes regulated by transcription factor:

template.name: ChromLocation_CRMOverlappingTFBindingsite
template.title: Chromosomal location [D. melanogaster] --> CRMs + TF binding sites overlapping these CRMs.

query.name: ChromLocation_CRMOverlappingTFBindingsite
query.view: CRM.primaryIdentifier CRM.length CRM.chromosome.primaryIdentifier CRM.chromosomeLocation.start CRM.chromosomeLocation.end CRM.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier CRM.overlappingFeatures.length CRM.overlappingFeatures.chromosome.primaryIdentifier CRM.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start CRM.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.end
query.longDescription: For a specific chromosomal location of D. melanogaster, show all CRMs and the TF binding sites that overlap these CRMs, according to REDfly. Show the chromosomal positions and lengths of all CRMs and TF binding sites.

template.name: Intergenic_RegRegion
template.title: Intergenic region [D. melanogaster] --> Regulatory elements.
template.comment: templates duplicates results when intergenic identifier is in output

query.name: Intergenic_RegRegion
query.longDescription: For the following intergenic region from D. melanogaster, show all regulatory elements with their chromosomal locations and lengths. Regulatory elements can include: CRMs and TF binding sites from REDfly, enhancers from FlyBase and predicted sites from Tiffin. (Data Source: FlyBase, REDfly, Tiffin).

query.name: ChromLocation_CRM
query.view: CRM.chromosome.primaryIdentifier CRM.chromosomeLocation.start CRM.chromosomeLocation.end CRM.primaryIdentifier CRM.length CRM.evidenceMethod CRM.publications.pubMedId
query.longDescription: For a specific chromosomal location of D. melanogaster, show all Cis-Regulatory Modules from REDfly with their length and chromosomal coordinates. (Data Source:REDfly).

query.name: DrosDel_GeneLocation
query.longDescription: Find all D. melanogaster genes interrupted by a specific DrosDel deletion. Show the chromosomal locations of the deletion and the genes. (Data Source: FlyBase).

query.name: Organism_transposableElementInsertionSites
query.longDescription: Show all transposable element insertion sites for a particular organism.

constraint.description: Show all transposable element insertion sites for organism:

template.name: Gene_upstreamRegulatoryRegions
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> Regulatory elements in the upstream intergenic region.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_upstreamRegulatoryRegions
query.longDescription: For a particular gene, show any regulatory elements found in its upstream intergenic region and the chromosome location of these regions. Regulatory elements can include: CRMs and TF binding sites from REDfly, enhancers from FlyBase and predicted sites from Tiffin. (Data Source: REDfly, Tiffin, FlyBase).

pathDescription.description: Gene > Upstream intergenic region > chromosome location

template.name: Pathway_GenesOrthol_new2
template.title: Pathway --> Genes + Orthologues in one specific organism.

query.name: Pathway_GenesOrthol_new2
query.longDescription: Show all the genes known to be involved in a specific KEGG, REACTOME or FlyReactome pathway and their orthologous genes in one specific organism. (Data Source: KEGG, Reactome, FlyReactome, inParanoid, Drosophila consortium).
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.description: Show all genes for the following pathway:
and give the orthologous genes from:
Use pathway dataset (KEGG, Reactome or FlyReactome):

template.name: ChromLocation_TFBindingSiteLocationGeneFactor
template.title: Chromosomal location [D. melanogaster] --> All TF binding sites.

query.name: ChromLocation_TFBindingSiteLocationGeneFactor
query.view: TFBindingSite.chromosome.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.start TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.end TFBindingSite.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.gene.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.gene.name TFBindingSite.factor.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.factor.name TFBindingSite.gene.regulatoryRegions.dataSets.dataSource.name
query.longDescription: For a particular D. melanogaster chromosomal location, show all REDfly TF binding sites with their locations and associated genes and transcription factors. (Data Source: REDfly).
query.constraintLogic: A and C and B and D

constraint.value: REDfly Drosophila transcription factor binding sites

constraint.description: Show transcription factor binding sites, transcription factors and associated genes on D. melanogaster chromosome:

query.name: Publication_Genes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.publications.pubMedId Gene.publications.title Gene.publications.firstAuthor Gene.publications.year
query.longDescription: Show all genes that were mentioned in a specific publication. References are loaded from FlyBase for all Drosophila species, and from NCBI for D. melanogaster, C. elegans and S. cerevisiae.

template.name: Gene_PointMutationLocation
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> Point mutations.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_PointMutationLocation
query.longDescription: For a particular D. melanogaster gene, search for overlapping point mutations with their chromosomal coordinates. (Data Source: FlyBase).

template.name: im_available_organisms
template.title: All genes --> TaxonId
template.comment: used for displaying links to other intermines

query.name: im_available_organisms
query.longDescription: For all genes, list the taxonIds available. Used by webservice to construct links to other intermines.

template.name: Stage_FlyFishBDGP
template.title: Stage [D. melanogaster] --> FlyFish + BDGP in situ data.

query.name: Stage_FlyFishBDGP
query.longDescription: For a given embryonic stage of Drosophila melanogaster, show which genes are expressed or not expressed according to the FlyFish and BDGP in situ projects.

template.name: Gene_ExonLocation2
template.title: Gene --> Exons.
template.comment: 07.02.07:re-written to work from gene identifier -Rachel. 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_ExonLocation2
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.exons.primaryIdentifier Gene.exons.length Gene.exons.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.exons.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.exons.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.exons.chromosomeLocation.strand
query.longDescription: For a specific gene, show its exons with their chromosomal locations and lengths.

constraint.description: Show the chromosome location of the exons of gene:

template.name: NaturalTransposableElement_InsertedElements
template.title: Natural Transposable Element --> Inserted Elements + Chromosomal Location

query.name: NaturalTransposableElement_InsertedElements
query.longDescription: For a particular transposable element show the individual elements and their chromosomal locations.

constraint.description: Show inserted elements for natural transposable element:

query.name: ESTclone_clusterLocation
query.longDescription: For a particular EST clone from A. gambiae show the clusters it belongs to and the chromosomal locations. (Data Source: VectorBase).

query.name: miRNAtargetGene_miRNAgene
query.longDescription: For a specified gene show any microRNA genes that are known to target it. (DataSet: miRBase).

template.name: Gene_Protein
template.title: Gene --> Proteins.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_Protein
query.longDescription: Show the proteins for a particular gene.

query.name: Gene_RegulatoryRegion
query.longDescription: Show all known regulatory elements for a particular D. melanogaster gene. Regulatory elements can include: CRMs and TF binding sites from REDfly and enhancers from FlyBase. (Data Source: REDfly, FlyBase).

template.name: GeneTissue_FlyAtlas
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] + Tissue [D. melanogaster] --> FlyAtlas data.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: GeneTissue_FlyAtlas
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.microArrayResults.material.primaryIdentifier Gene.microArrayResults.presentCall Gene.microArrayResults.enrichment Gene.microArrayResults.affyCall Gene.microArrayResults.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: For a given D. melanogaster gene, show expression data for a particular tissue from FlyAtlas.(Data Source: FlyAtlas).
query.constraintLogic: B and A and D and C

query.name: Organism_3UTR
query.longDescription: Show all 3' UTRs for a particular organism.

template.name: Gene_IntronChromosome
template.title: Gene --> Introns.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_IntronChromosome
query.longDescription: For a particular gene, list the introns with their intron chromosomal locations and lengths.

constraint.description: Show transcripts and introns for gene:

template.name: ChromLocation_GeneTranscriptExon
template.title: Chromosomal location --> All genes + Transcripts + Exons.

query.name: ChromLocation_GeneTranscriptExon
query.longDescription: For a specified organism and chromosomal location show all genes, transcripts and exons.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

template.name: AllGene_Chromosome
template.title: All genes in organism --> All chromosomal locations.

query.name: AllGene_Chromosome
query.view: Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.length Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol
query.longDescription: For a specified organism, show the chromosomal location and sequence length for all genes.

constraint.description: Show the chromosome location and gene sequences for all genes from organism:

template.name: ChromosomeLocation_ESTclusterandESTs
template.title: Chromosomal location [A. gambiae] --> EST clusters + ESTs.

query.name: ChromosomeLocation_ESTclusterandESTs
query.longDescription: For a particular chromosomal location from A. gambiae show all EST clusters and ESTs. (Data Source: VectorBase).

template.name: UnalignedESTclusters
template.title: EST cluster type [A. gambiae] --> All unaligned EST clusters.

query.name: UnalignedESTclusters
query.longDescription: Show all A. gambiae clusters which have no match to the genome. (Data Source: VectorBase).

query.name: Clone_gene
query.longDescription: For a cDNA clone or list of clones give the corresponding gene identifiers.

template.name: Protein_GOterms
template.title: Protein --> GO terms.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from protein class - Philip

query.name: Protein_GOterms
query.longDescription: Show all GO terms that have been associated with the gene that codes for the following protein.

template.name: Gene_DrosophilaOrthologues
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> Orthologues in other Drosophila species

query.name: Gene_DrosophilaOrthologues
query.longDescription: For a particular Drosophila gene or list of genes show the orthologues in the other Drosophila species.

constraint.description: Show the Drosophila orthologues for gene(s):

query.name: Gene_1CDSsequence
query.longDescription: Show the CDS and its sequence for all genes from a particular organism. This template contains an additional constraint to limit the result to one CDS per sequence (e.g all -PA CDS from D. melanogaster).

constraint.description: that have this constraint in their primary identifier:

template.name: GOterm_genesDrosDelDeletion
template.title: GO term name [D. melanogaster] --> All genes with DrosDel deletions.

query.name: GOterm_genesDrosDelDeletion
query.longDescription: Show all D. melanogaster genes that have been annotated with a particular GO term and the DrosDel deletions which would delete these genes. Show whether the deletion is available. (Data Source: GO, FlyBase, DrosDel).

template.name: Gene_RegionLocation
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> CRMs.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_RegionLocation
query.longDescription: For a specific gene from D. melanogaster, show its Cis-Regulatory Modules, their chromosomal locations and lengths. (Data Source: REDfly)

template.name: ECnumber_gene_protein
template.title: Enzyme Commission number --> Genes and Proteins in a specified organism.

query.name: ECnumber_gene_protein
query.view: Protein.ecNumber Protein.genes.organism.name Protein.genes.name Protein.genes.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.symbol Protein.primaryAccession Protein.primaryIdentifier
query.longDescription: For a specified Enzyme Commission (EC)number show the corresponding genes and proteins in a particular organism.

constraint.description: Show the genes and proteins in:

query.name: ChromLocation_RegulatoryRegion
query.longDescription: Show all regulatory elements in a particular chromosomal location in the D. melanogaster genome. Regulatory elements can include: CRMs and TF binding sites from REDfly, enhancers from FlyBase and predicted sites from Tiffin. (Data Source: REDfly, FlyBase, Tiffin).

constraint.description: Show all regulatory elements on D. melanogaster chromosome:

query.name: ProbeSet_FlyAtlas
query.view: ProbeSet.primaryIdentifier ProbeSet.results.presentCall ProbeSet.results.enrichment ProbeSet.results.affyCall ProbeSet.dataSets.name ProbeSet.results.dataSets.name ProbeSet.results.tissue.name
query.longDescription: Show the expression data of the following probeset in the FlyAtlas experiments. (Data Source: Affymetrix, FlyAtlas).

template.name: Gene_FlyAtlas
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> FlyAtlas data.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_FlyAtlas
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.microArrayResults.mRNASignal Gene.microArrayResults.mRNASignalSEM Gene.microArrayResults.presentCall Gene.microArrayResults.enrichment Gene.microArrayResults.affyCall Gene.microArrayResults.material.primaryIdentifier Gene.microArrayResults.dataSets.name Gene.microArrayResults.tissue.name
query.longDescription: For a given D. melanogaster gene, show expression data from FlyAtlas.

template.title: Orthologue converter

query.name: im_orthologue_converter

query.name: Tissue_Flyatlas
query.view: FlyAtlasResult.mRNASignal FlyAtlasResult.mRNASignalSEM FlyAtlasResult.presentCall FlyAtlasResult.enrichment FlyAtlasResult.affyCall FlyAtlasResult.genes.primaryIdentifier FlyAtlasResult.genes.symbol FlyAtlasResult.material.primaryIdentifier FlyAtlasResult.dataSets.name

query.constraintLogic: C and B and D and E and A

template.name: GOterm_GenesInsertions
template.title: GO term name [D. melanogaster] --> All genes with insertions.

query.name: GOterm_GenesInsertions
query.longDescription: Show all D. melanogaster genes that have been annotated with a particular GO term and that have insertions. (Data Source: GO, FlyBase).

template.name: Gene_BDGP
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> BDGP in situ data.

query.name: Gene_BDGP
query.longDescription: For a certain D. melanogaster gene, show the results from the BDGP in situ project. (Data Source: BDGP).

template.name: ESTclustertype_chromosomelocation
template.title: EST cluster type [A. gambiae] --> Chromosomal location.

query.name: ESTclustertype_chromosomelocation
query.longDescription: Show the chromosomal location of all Anopheles gambiae EST clusters and ESTs of a particular type. Use TCLAG* to show all T-clusters (type 1 EST-to-genome alignments). These are defined as those clusters which contain at least one unambiguously mapped EST. Use NCLAG* to show clusters with no type 1 matches.

template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> INDAC long oligos.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_Probe

query.name: Gene_FlyFish

query.longDescription: Show the gene that codes for the following protein, with its chromosomal location and length.

query.name: Organism_Intergenic
query.longDescription: For a particular organism, show all intergenic regions with their chromosomal locations, lenghts and adjacent genes. (Data Source: FlyMine).

query.name: All_Genes_In_Organism_To_Publications
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.publications.pubMedId Gene.publications.firstAuthor Gene.publications.journal Gene.publications.year Gene.organism.name
query.longDescription: Show the publications for each gene in one organism. References are loaded from FlyBase for all Drosophila species, and from NCBI for D. melanogaster, C. elegans and S. cerevisiae.

query.longDescription: Search for GO annotations for a particular gene.

query.name: Chromosome_Gene
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand
query.longDescription: Show genes located on a particular chromosome.

query.name: PointMutation_Gene_Chromosome
query.view: PointMutation.primaryIdentifier PointMutation.chromosome.primaryIdentifier PointMutation.chromosomeLocation.start PointMutation.chromosomeLocation.end PointMutation.chromosomeLocation.strand PointMutation.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier PointMutation.overlappingFeatures.symbol PointMutation.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start PointMutation.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.end PointMutation.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.strand PointMutation.dataSets.dataSource.name

query.longDescription: For a particular gene show the transposon insertions that overlap its exons. (Data Source: FlyBase).
